    • update

      public void update​(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      Receives the message coming from the server. Parses the message and based on the content of the Data and TypeOfMessage field, does a certain operation. TypeOfMessage codes: 0 â€“ Registration. 3 â€“ Connected players list. 1 â€“ Selected gods list. 2 â€“ God selected by a player. 4 â€“ Receive a playerâ€™s worker starting position. 5 & 6 â€“ Receives the new board after a build/move. 20 â€“ Confirmation message of connection. 25 â€“ Crash handler during god selection. 30 â€“ Players win condition. 40 â€“ A player is stuck with both workers. 60 â€“ Request to load a game. 65 â€“ Receive previous game data. 70 â€“ Tells the player the game state after loading. 420 â€“ Contains a list of players and their gods.
